TopicTitle: Requesting help from someone from medicine

Articles.Content:
I'm starting to write something new (don't want to give too much away) and would like to keep it as medically correct as possible, especially since it'll be based within a hospital. 

I could google some of this but I'd rather have someone who knows the specifics better and can possibly better drive both the diseases, injuries, conditions as well as the medicines and treatments used. 

As far as what I mean by 'medicine' (I am aware that is a generic and very broad term considering the field of possibilities it could imply) is someone who knows problems hospital patients have (the common cases, the rare cases), the treatment(s), and such. 

If you know someone then please let me know in a PM, or if you don't understand and have questions let me know. 

I apologize if this is a bit vague. It's one of those cases where I know what I want but I don't quite know what the proper form of the question.
